3862842465.resolved_title: The Complete Introduction to Survival Analysis in Python
3862842465.excerpt: Survival analysis is a fascinating field, but rarely used or mentioned at all by data science practitioners, at least in my experience. While it is mostly used in the healthcare industry, survival analysis can also be used in a wide variety of domains.

3771948711.given_title: What Is Survival Analysis? Examples by Hand and in R
3771948711.resolved_title: What Is Survival Analysis? Examples by Hand and in R
3771948711.excerpt: For the last post of the year, I would like to present a rather unknown (yet important) statistical method: survival analysis. Although survival analysis is a branch of statistics, it is usually not covered in introductory statistics courses and it is rather unknown to the general public.
